title: pcsx 2 + shadow of colossus + bios ps2 emulator pc
description:
Extract the game iso using WinRAR....
u can burn it to a dvd to play in ps2...
or use the iso for testing ur pcsx2....

INSTRUCTIONS:

1. INSTALL pcsx 2,,ignore the addons....
2. Open it,,the default plugins will automatically load up,,just click on next.
3. It will then say to select a bios rom,,which will be empty...
4. Copy the contents of 'bios' folder included the torrent...
5. Open My documents,,u'll see a folder named 'PCSX2',,open it and look for a folder name 'bios'...
6. it will be empty,,so paste the bios content that I have provided....
7. Refresh the list now and u will se all the bios...
8. Select the japan console bios.....and ur done !!
9. Go to config,,controllers,,plug in settings,,select pad1 and set the controller mapping according to ur pc (gamepad recommended)...
10. Go to config,,video,,plugin settings,,in adapter select ur gpu,,then select dx11 and then the resolution (uncheck native resolution)...
11. Go to config,,emulation settings,,select GS window and specify the resolution....


Select cdvd and then iso selector and select the iso of the game provided...
Go to system and select boot,,it will launch...

Basically,,configuration settings can be found on youtube,,its important u execute till step 9.....

Pcsx 2 requires minimum requirements for a playable experiencce
* Windows Vista 32bit/64bit
 * CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 3.2ghz or better
 * GPU: 8600gt or better
 * 4gb ram
It's best if u hve a i5/4gb ram/1gb gpu....

If u r able to run this,,den u will be able to play most of the other ps2 games including god of war 2.....hope it works

ENJOY and SEED....
